title: Permaban this player Riot.
body:
Alright. So I was playing some ranked games with my mate. In the first game of the day, we encountered a player by the name of **[REMOVED]**. The second we entered champion select he typed "Taking mid otherwise trolling." (he was assigned support). When he didn't get his way, he insta-locked Teemo with Cleanse and Ghost. In game, he did everything you would expect a guy like this to do. (Feed, AFK, make smart-ass comments and just being a dickhead in general.) The following are the screenshots from champion select. **[REMOVED]** shows the stats from the game. (I am Dalek and my mate is Vashta Nerada.)
Please ban this scum Riot.

replies.body: raise a support ticket if it was particularly nasty. The boards DGAF.

I am so not clicking on those links. Never heard of that site and it looks fishy. 

Also naming and shaming on the forums is a bannable offence if i remember correctly. Has been for many many many years.
Im trying to ban a toxic player. And GYAZO is a screenshotting program. Look it up.
There are so many ways to get someone banned like Princess said, do that. Forums are the WRONG place to put it. Trust me i have seen countless people get banned trying to ban ppl.

If you are trying to get a player punished, coming to the boards isn't going to help much. Send in a support ticket with your evidence, Keep in mind that Riot is unable to tell you the outcome of the case due to privacy reasons.
Alright. Thanks for the info. I will do that.
